data.eml:eml: Three new species of Neofidelia (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae) from Northern Chile

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dumesh, Sheila, Packer, Laurence (2013): Three new species of Neofidelia (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae) from Northern Chile. Zootaxa 3609 (5): 471-483, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3609.5.3
